sect2.title: Introduction to AbiWord
sect2.para: The AbiWord package contains a word processing application. This is useful for writing reports, letters and other formatted documents.

Note that the current (version 4.1.x) stack does not pose a conflict with any of the previous versions (but does not support AbiWord database access. AbiWord requires versions <1.3.0.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: --without-inter7eps: Some of the headers from the EPS package are not compatible with GCC-&gcc-version;. This parameter prevents linking to the package and incurring a build failure.
--disable-static: This switch prevents the static library being built. On x86_64 it also saves a large amount of build time.
--enable-plugins=collab: Build some or all of the collab plugins.
sed -i '...' tools/ots/xp/AbiOts.cpp : This command is used to fix an incompatibility with GCC and the libots package.
